adrFormatAddress: 42 E 12th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I have been working with Keith for 6 months and could not be happier. Tremendous results: I am much stronger, my posture has improved and have lost 10 pounds. I love the environment at Nimble - it is welcoming and friendly, no attitude. I always feel better after my work out sessions with Keith - I am looking forward to continuing this journey in 2024.

originalText.text: I've visited Nimble once a week for over a year. Though I'm active and young, I struggled with total body stiffness for some years. The careful training sessions and program my trainer Jenean Baylor provided me have dramatically improved my mobility and elimated the persistent pain I'd struggled with.

text.text: I've visited Nimble once a week for over a year. Though I'm active and young, I struggled with total body stiffness for some years. The careful training sessions and program my trainer Jenean Baylor provided me have dramatically improved my mobility and elimated the persistent pain I'd struggled with.

originalText.text: I excel at inertia but got to a point where I wanted to improve core strength and posture before my bad habits had long lasting, negative effects. Working first with Daniel and now with Jeremy has been fantastic. They took a scaffolded approach to training so I built confidence and grew stronger without agitating a decade old back injury. Whether you’re a hard core athlete or terrified of the gym, I recommend Nimble.

Whether you’re a hard core athlete or terrified of the gym, I recommend Nimble.

originalText.text: I've been going to Nimble for several months now and Eden has helped me stay dedicated and committed! Despite having to wake up early and to work hard it is totally worth it she gives me motivation and has been supporting me all the way! I have also had several sessions with Jason and he's also wonderful to train with, has a lot of knowledge and always makes sure he can help with whatever struggles I'm going through. I highly recommend Nimble. Very friendly staff overall and never gets too crowded.

text.text: I've been going to Nimble for several months now and Eden has helped me stay dedicated and committed! originalText.text:
The Summary: Personal attention, flexibility in scheduling, friendly attitude, clean environment, and (of course) a resulting effective work out. I work out with Ian Kurtz and I love it.

The Juice: This is a great little gym and I was in a pretty abysmal post-pandemic shape when I first joined. My first consultation with Daniel Lucas was thorough, personable, effective. He picked a trainer he felt was best suited for my goals. I have been coming for a couple of years by now and I work with Ian Kurtz. It is a no-nonsense work out, very functional movement, often incorporating multiple parts of the body. By now we have focused on a few areas that needed work. Ian is diligent in addressing pain-points (literal and metaphorical) by investigating the issue and tailoring the approach, depending on the cause. As an athlete, he has great personal understanding of and great tips on how to work with what you've got - being able to stay physically active and engaged through your preferred activities even if your body is giving you a bit of flack at the moment.
